content: Hello Welcome to my service thread ¬†üî•‚úÖ„ÄêTranslation Service„ÄëüåüProfessional Translation from English to Arabicüåü‚úÖ(Pay at your will)I have been interested in cryptocurrency and blockchain for several years and have been an active member of this forum for more than 4 years.I can provide you with a 100% professional translation service from English to Arabic. The translation will be manual, professional, with high quality and compliance with stipulated deadlines, taking into account the rules of the Arabic language and culture according to the subject of the translation.The Arabic language is the fourth most used language around the world, with a population of more than half a billion people. I can help you expand your project to reach the largest number of users around the world..What I Translate:ArticlesAppsWebsitesAnnouncement ThreadsBounty ThreadsWhitepapersAcademic documentsStudent ResearchCommercial correspondence and contractsOther Documents*After the service is completed, I will also be ready for any modification or inquiry you want.Payment Methods:BTC: bitcoinETH: ethereumUSDT: Erc20/Trc20Contacts:Forum PM: (Click here)Telegram: @Kavelj22

comments.author: albon
comments.body: A professional translator and a trustworthy person, he will finish the work in the fastest time with all professionalism, I advise everyone to deal with him ¬†Anyway, you can set the prices of your service so that it is easy for everyone to know the prices of what you offer.Good Luck

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: Quote from: albon on October 25, 2022, 06:49:56 PMAnyway, you can set the prices of your service so that it is easy for everyone to know the prices of what you offer.The price will be determined by the type of documents and the topics they contain.In many of the projects I worked on, I took into account the approved budget, especially with start-up projects. Translating a site with many pages will not only be priced based on the number of words but also the time it will take to do so.I will also allocate very low prices for students who want to translate scientific files that will help them in their research or in spreading awareness about a topic.
